code: import React from'react';import{useTodos}from'../../hooks/useTodos';import TodoItem from'./TodoItem';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TodoList=()=>{const{filteredTodos,searchTerm}=useTodos();if(filteredTodos.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-center py-12",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-gray-400 text-lg mb-2",children:searchTerm?'No tasks found':'No tasks yet'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-gray-500 text-sm",children:searchTerm?'Try adjusting your search':'Add your first task to get started'})]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"space-y-3",children:filteredTodos.map(todo=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TodoItem,{todo:todo},todo.id))});};export default TodoList;
